DataElement.preferredName: PRO-CTCAE Version 1.0 63b. Past Seven Days How Much Frequent Urination Interfered with Usual or Daily Activities 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how much frequent urination interfered with usual or daily activities over the past seven days, using a text term rating of the amount of interference.
